sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Evacuees fleeing the military coup in Niger arrive in Europe as West African leaders demand President Bazoum is reinstated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Turkey's president urges Russia to renew grain deal with Kiev as a Ukrainian city is struck by drone damaging 44,000 tons of grain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis has blasted Portugal's Catholic church leaders for the clergy sex abuse scandal as he kicks off his visit for World Youth Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And mud has taken the shine of the largest metal music festival in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Germany's walk-in festival has limited the number of people attending after non-stop rain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A plane carrying around 100 people fleeing Niger arrived in Rome on Wednesday aboard a special flight organised by the Italian government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Among them Nigerians, Italians and other nationalities fleeing the coup that overthrew the democratically elected president last week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Passengers on an evacuation flight from Niger have also landed in Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: France has chartered planes to rescue some 600 people wishing to be repatriated and other foreign nationals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, West African heads of state continue to apply pressure on Niger's military junta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: ECOWAS leaders have not ruled out the use of force against the coup leaders if they don't restore power to the civil authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Niger's coup leaders have the support of Mali and Burkina Faso.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The neighboring countries, which are also governed by the military, warn that any armed intervention in Niger would be considered a declaration of war against them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Nigerian junta, which accuses France of wanting to intervene militarily, has sent an emissary to Mali, also a former French colony, to analyze the situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: In a telephone conversation, Turkey's President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has urged his Russian counterpart to renew the UN-brokered grain export agreement with Ukraine, referring to it as a bridge of peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Russia quit the agreement that allowed Ukrainian boats carrying grain a safe passage in the Black Sea last month. Russia is ready to return to the deal, not only to the negotiations, but to the deal itself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It is ready to do it immediately.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The deal must be implemented in the part that concerns the Russian Federation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: So far, this has not been done, as you know.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The U.S. is also reporting that Moscow is ready to return to the negotiation table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: reporting that Moscow is ready to return to the negotiation table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We have seen indications that they might be interested in returning to discussions, so we will wait to see whether that actually happens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moscow has aggressively targeted Ukrainian ports and grain infrastructure since it withdrew from the deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Wednesday, a drone hit a port city along the border with Romania, sparking a huge fire at key facilities and damaging some 44,000 tons of grain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Flowers, military honors and much applause in a delicate visit to Portugal by Pope Francis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The leader of the Catholic Church has come to Lisbon to participate in World Youth Day, an event expected to be attended by one million pilgrims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the first of the five-day tour, the Pope asked Europe to do more to bring peace to Ukraine. Looking with close affection at Europe in the spirit of dialogue that characterizes it, one would ask, where do you go if you do not offer paths of peace, creative ways to end the war in Ukraine and the many conflicts that blood the world? The Pope also blasted Portugal's Catholic Church leaders for the clergy sex abuse scandal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A panel of experts reported in February that priests and other personnel may have abused at least 4,815 boys and girls since 1950.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Church needs a humble and constant purification, the pontiff said. Donald Donald Trump has been charged by the U.S. Justice Department

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: for his efforts to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The charges include conspiracy to defraud the United States government and witness tampering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's the third criminal case brought against the former president as he seeks a second term in the White House.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The indictment document is 45 pages long.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Among the four major charges, obstruction of an official proceeding carries up to 20 years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The criminal case is especially stunning as it accuses Trump of assaulting the underpinnings of democracy in his frantic and ultimately failed effort to cling to power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In this case, my office will seek a speedy trial so that our evidence can be tested in court and judged by a jury of citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In the meantime, I must emphasize that the indictment is only an allegation and that the defendant must be presumed innocent until proven guilty beyond a reasonable doubt in a court of law. Trump has been summoned to appear before a judge in court in Washington, D.C. on Thursday. He already faces charges brought by Smith's team over alleged mishandling of classified documents in Florida. Trump also faces trial in New York for falsifying business records in hush money payments to an adult film star. Good news for NASA after detected a heartbeat signal from its Voyager 2

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: probe. The spacecraft has been exploring the universe since 1977.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But mission controllers lost contact with it over a week ago after sending a faulty command that tilted its antenna to point two degrees away from Earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: As a result, the probe, which is currently some 20 billion kilometers from Earth, stopped receiving commands or sending data. But the signal received on Tuesday has reassured the space agency that it's still functioning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: August the 2nd marks Earth Overshoot Day. It's the date in any given year on which humanity

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: has used up its annual allowance of vital natural resources like water. Since the 1970s, the trend is seen this day arrive earlier each year. It means humanity's demand on ecological resources exceeds what the earth can regenerate. The foundation behind the concept measures the rate at which crops, livestock, fish and forest products are being depleted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We mark a number of days in the year, Christmas, national holidays, etc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Probably the most meaningful one is Earth Overshoot Day, because it reflects a reality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's not just an artificial day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: So we can calculate how much can be regenerated in a given country and then add it up to the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We can also calculate it on the consumption side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We can look at how much is being consumed in each country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: To reverse the trend, campaigners say humanity needs to phase out fossil fuels as a starting point.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And the responsibility lies not just with governments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Global Footprint Network says with 7 billion people on the planet, we can all help by reducing our individual consumption of precious resources.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Italy were knocked out of the Women's World Cup after conceding a late goal against South Africa in Wellington on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Fembe Catalan scored in the dying minutes of the game to hand South Africa a stunning 3-2 win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They'll lock horns with Group E winners the Netherlands on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Sweden outclassed Argentina to set up a thrilling last-16 clash with the USA.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Group F, Jamaica defied the odds by dumping Brazil out of the competition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was a tense affair in Melbourne, which ended with a goalless draw, enough to see Jamaica advance to the knockout phase.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They finished second in the group, behind France France who thumped Panama 6-3 thanks to a hat-trick from Khadij Diani.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Former Italy goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon has retired from football at the age of 45 after an impressive 28-year career.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The shot-stoppers accolades include a World Cup, 10 Serie A titles with Juventus and one Ligue 1 title with Paris Saint-Germain. Buffon's remarkable journey started when he joined Juventus from Parma in 2001. He made a record 657 appearances in Italy's top flight and 176 for the national side, making him the country's most capped player ever.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The U.S. singer Lizzo is being sued by three of her former dancers who accused her of numerous

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: charges, including sexual, religious and racial harassment, disability discrimination, assault and false imprisonment. The Grammy winner, whose real name is Melissa Vivian Jefferson, has garnered a global reputation for body positivity and songs addressing mental health.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The civil lawsuit also targets her production company and her dance team for allegedly creating a hostile work environment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Lizzo has not yet commented on the lawsuit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Mud has taken the shine off the largest metal music festival in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The walk-in open-air festival in Germany has been forced to reduce the number of people attending the event after heavy rain turned the ground sludge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Around 50,000 people made it into the festival before organizers stopped at missions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A drop from the 85,000 people who die Tickets gekauft haben und die erwartet wurden, um anzusehen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Die Stimmung ist vielleicht etwas feucht, aber im Allgemeinen würde ich sagen, dennoch relativ gut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Also man macht das Beste draus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Gerade als wir aufgebaut haben, kam dann die Nachricht, dass keine Autos mehr anreisen dürfen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Und wir dachten so, oh mein Gott, wie viel we are that we are still on the spot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Traffic jams around the festival were largely cleared out by Wednesday morning after many fans turned back or sought alternative camping sites.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Those who remained tried their best to enjoy the 150 metal bands scheduled to play throughout the festival, despite the 40 liters per square meter of water that fell in a span of just 24 hours.
